review_data.title: Total unfreundlicher & arroganter Besitzer, unangenehme Stimmung
review_data.content: Sehr unangenehme Stimmung in der Trottoir Bar. Besitzer extrem arrogant, hat im Alkoholrausch den Gästen Shots angeworfen.

review_data.title: Trottoir Barre is Fantastic
review_data.content: I visited this bar with a few friends over Halloween weekend during my first trip to Zurich. We really enjoyed ourselves. The decor is very cool and creative, the atmosphere is relaxed and fun, the music is actually good and the owner and staff made...More

review_data.title: Music Bar
review_data.content: Great atmosphere and good looking interior design. Friendly people and staff! Super fun and great drinks.

review_data.title: Meeega
review_data.content: Very cozy place lot's of fun 🤘🏼 I really can recommend it😁 Just swing by and see it for yourself.
